summary.name: Krzysztof Jamróz
summary.title: Engineering Director
summary.bio: After twenty years in tech, my journey has taken me from writing code to leading teams. Moving from software engineer to engineering leader, I’ve seen the power of blending technology with business strategy. Now, my focus is on building strong teams that know how to harness tech effectively and creating a company culture that’s all about delivering products with big ideas behind them.
